column1: Calimmacil was the son of [[Arciryas]], and therefore a nephew of [[Narmacil II]] ({{TA
Calimmacil had a son, [[Siriondil (son of Calimmacil)

Nothing is known about the life of Calimmacil, who enters history because after King [[Ondoher]] and his sons were slain in battle, his grandson Eärnil was chosen to succeed Ondoher to the throne.<ref>{{App
